revised_title: A New Method for Calculating Annuities on Lives
tldr: The author, Abraham De Moivre, presents a new method for calculating the value of annuities on lives using tables of observations. This method considers the time elapsed between the last payment and the moment of the life's expiration, providing a more accurate calculation for annuities. The new method also accounts for the possibility of different intervals of life having uniform decrements, improving the connection between various life stages.
